public class Pillar
extends RectangleGraphicElement
creates obstacles for the bird

    • update

      public void update()
      Description copied from class: GraphicElement
      Method in which the internal parameters of the GraphicElement (i.e. position or any other parameters that are introduced by derived classes to define a shape) can be updated. The next rendering step (render) can then be be based on these new internal parameters.
      Overrides:
      update in class GraphicElement
